title: Monday Post Show (09-27-21)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show (09-27-21)
description:
Bobby opens the post show by updating us on his hurt wrist and colonoscopy and possible eczema. We get an update from Lunchbox who is currently on the road to Arkansas to the diamond mind. He is also planning to stop at a casino in Arkansas. He will also be live on Facebook later when he starts digging. We also talk about what Amy heard about how your luggage may have radiation. We also play another round of 20 questions.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
